text: Miao Chunting (May 1919 â€“ 17 September 2020) was a Chinese politician. He was born in Shandong Province. He was twice Chairman of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference Committee of Guizhou from 1959 to 1967 and again from 1980 to 1993. He was a member of the Communist Party of China. Miao died on 17 September 2020 in Guizhou at the age of 101. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Chinese centenarians Category:Chinese politicians Category:People from Guizhou Category:People from Shandong Category:20th-century Chinese people Category:21st-century Chinese people
title: Miao Chunting
